price: We have certainly destroyed some towns around you and had given them numerous signs, so that they might return [from disbelief].
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
